name: Chekrut Hellhound
text:
1 FIRE Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to your GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can tribute this card, then target 1 FIRE monster you control; that target is unaffected by card effects until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut HellHound" once per turn.
